message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think it would be perfect for you and I'm willing to part with it for $11,500. What do you think?
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10,800. Would you be willing to consider that?
I understand your position, Bob, but $11,500 is already a very fair price for this product. How about we meet in the middle at $11,150?
I'm still a bit short on budget, so I'd like to propose $10,900. Would you be willing to consider that?
Bob, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate.  To make this happen, I can go down to $11,025. This is my final offer.
I'm really close to walking away, but I'd like to try one more time. How about $10,800?
